DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study test LY2951742 relieve mild moderate knee pain . The study drug give injection skin oral capsule . The study last 28 week participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study LY2951742 Participants With Mild Moderate Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Have osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee joint base American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion confirm Xrays ACR functional class I III Have stable dose prescription Nonsteroidal AntiInflammatory Drugs ( NSAIDS ) , celecoxib , tramadol , acetaminophen least 2000 mg per day least 20 day past month Willing stop analgesic OA pain study Experienced pain target knee base Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) Allergic LY2951742 , celecoxib , NSAIDS , include aspirin , similar drug Arthritis knee cause Uncontrolled hypertension Have OA pain require treatment potent opioids , systemic corticosteroid , intraarticular injection , duloxetine , venlafaxine Moderate severe renal impairment Pregnant lactating
